# Sitecore

## Accelerate Cookbook for Content Hub
This Cookbook provides a set of recipes to help implementing Content Hub through setup, configuration and implemenation.

## Best Practice articles

- [Discovery](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/pre-development/discovery)
- [Discovery Phase](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/pre-development/discovery/discovery-phase)
- [Requirements Gathering](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/pre-development/discovery/requirements-gathering)
- [Project Planning](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/pre-development/discovery/project-planning)
- [Multi Environments Deployment](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/pre-development/sprint-zero/multi-environments-deployment)
- [Configuration](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/configuration)
- [Distribution of Assets](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/configuration/distribution-of-assets)
- [Distribution of Content](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/configuration/distribution-of-content)
- [Environment Specific Settings](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/configuration/environment-specific-settings)
- [Paths across Entity Definitions](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/configuration/paths-across-entity-definitions)
- [Schema Management](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/schema-management)
- [Taxonomy vs Option Lists](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/schema-management/taxonomy-vs-option-list)
- [Custom Logic](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic)
- [Catching Renditions Generation](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/catching-rendition-generation)
- [Conditionally Generate Renditions](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/conditionally-generate-renditions)
- [Developing External Components](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/developing-external-components)
- [External Integrations](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/external-integrations)
- [Scripts Guidance and Scenarios](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/scripting-guidance-and-scenarios)
- [Webclient SDK Scenarios](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/custom-logic/webclient-sdk-scenarios)
- [Functional Security](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/functional-security)
- [Debugging User Security](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/functional-security/debugging-user-security)
- [Single-Sign On](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/functional-security/sso-on-content-hub)
- [User Groups Setup](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/functional-security/user-groups-setup)
- [State Flow and Approval](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/implementation/state-flow-and-approval)
- [Migration Guide](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/final-steps/migration-guide)
- [Testing and Quality Assurance](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/final-steps/testing-and-qa)
- [Implementation Testing](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/final-steps/testing-and-qa/implementation-testing)
- [Quality Assurance](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/final-steps/testing-and-qa/quality-assurance)
- [Go-Live Checklist](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/final-steps/go-live-checklist)
- [Content Hub Glossary](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/content-hub/appendix-i/content-hub-glossary)

## Accelerate Cookbook for XM Cloud
This Cookbook provides a set of recipes to help implementing XM Cloud through setup, configuration and implementation.

## Best Practice articles

- [Discovery](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/discovery)
- [Moving to SaaS](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/discovery/moving-to-saas)
- [Transition from XM/XP to XM Cloud](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/discovery/xm-xp-to-xmc)
- [Requirements Gathering](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/discovery/requirements-gathering)
- [Project Planning](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-planning)
- [Preparing for an XM Cloud Project](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-planning/preparing-for-an-xm-cloud-project)
- [Project Estimation](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-planning/project-estimation)
- [Hosting Applications](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/hosting-applications)
- [Hosting Web Application](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/hosting-applications/hosting-web-application)
- [Hosting Next.js on Azure App Services](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/hosting-applications/nextjs-azure-app-services)
- [Developer Considerations](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/developer-considerations)
- [Branching Strategy](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/developer-considerations/branching-strategy)
- [Components Design Best Practices](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/developer-considerations/component-design-best-practices)
- [Development Workflow: Github Codespaces](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/developer-considerations/dev-workflow-codespaces)
- [Next.js App Router Preparation](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/developer-considerations/nextjs-app-router-preparation)
- [Security](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/security)
- [Head Application Security](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/security/head-application-security)
- [Information Architecture](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/information-architecture)
- [Content Audit](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/information-architecture/content-audit)
- [Publishing to Edge](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/information-architecture/publishing-to-edge)
- [Project Architecture](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-architecture)
- [Layout Routing](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-architecture/layout-routing)
- [Multisite Architecture](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-architecture/multisite)
- [Rate Limits and Caching](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-architecture/rate-limits-and-caching)
- [Site management](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/project-architecture/site-management)
- [Sprint Zero](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/sprint-zero)
- [Project Solution Setup](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/sprint-zero/project-solution-setup)
- [Creating a Site](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/sprint-zero/creating-a-site)
- [Setup Content Serialization](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/sprint-zero/setup-content-serialization)
- [DevOps](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/pre-development/sprint-zero/devops)
- [Developer Experience](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience)
- [Creating New Components](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience/creating-new-components)
- [Creating Branch Templates](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience/creating-branch-templates)
- [Creating a Component Gallery](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience/creating-a-component-gallery)
- [Using Placeholders](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience/using-placeholders)
- [Troubleshooting Docker](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/developer-experience/troubleshooting-docker)
- [Information Architecture](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture)
- [Localization](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture/localization)
- [Redirect](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture/redirect)
- [Sitemap](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture/sitemap)
- [Wildcard Pages](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture/wildcard-pages)
- [Workflows](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/information-architecture/workflow)
- [External Data Integration](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/external-data-integration)
- [Retrieving Data from 3rd Party](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/external-data-integration/retrieving-data-from-3rd-party-integrations)
- [Custom Editing UX for 3rd Party](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/external-data-integration/custom-editing-ux-3rd-party-integrations)
- [Getting Component Specific Data](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/external-data-integration/getting-component-specific-data)
- [Sitecore Search](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/sitecore-search)
- [Integrating Sitecore Search](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/sitecore-search/integrating-sitecore-search)
- [Incrementally updating Search](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/implementation/sitecore-search/search-incremental-updates)
- [Go-Live Checklist](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/final-steps/go-live-checklist)
- [On-page SEO optimization](https://developers.sitecore.com/learn/accelerate/xm-cloud/optimization/seo-web-optimization)
